actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program to provide supportive services in federally assisted housing.
short_title: Supportive Services in Housing Act of 1991

summary.text: Supportive Services in Housing Act of 1991 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program of supportive services for older persons in federally assisted housing. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Supportive Services in Housing Act of 1991
To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program to provide supportive services in federally assisted housing.
